about_the_game:
Download this handsome hands-on preview of Super Adventure Hand to get a taste of what the full game hands you.

Super Adventure Hand
You, a former gloves sales-hand, suddenly find yourself alone. Your best friend Arm is no longer attached to your wrist.
What happened, was it those nasty feet that are always plotting against you? Or some other evil being?



Let the hand do the walking and enjoy this gripping 3D platformer where you play as a handsome hand. Avoid dangerous obstacles and find your way to the magic mug at the end of each level. Buy the full game for the complete experience.

  • Processor: i5 or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 560 or similar
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: It’s the world’s most adventurous hand! Download this hands-on preview of Super Adventure Hand. You play as a hand on a gripping handventure where you need to handle numerous obstacles and avoid the terrible feet.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Ukrainian
